Dinner (or Lunch) Theatre Packages

We are pleased to offer our dinner theatre packages in conjunction with The Lamplighter restaurant. The Lamplighter has been a Delmont tradition for over 80 years. Run by the Ferri Family, patrons enjoy fresh baked breads, cakes and pies from their in-house bakery. We encourage you to enjoy dinner or lunch before the show, only a 2 minute drive away from the theatre.

The Lamplighter is located at 6566 Rt 22, Delmont PA 51626

Dinner Theatre is not available for July 4.

Suggested Arrival Times Lunch: 12:00 PM Dinner: Between 5:00 and 5:30 PM Patron pays for package at The Lamplighter and receives a voucher to exchange for seat tickets at the theatre box office. Prices include food, tax and tip. Reservations can be made through The Lamplighter (724-468-4545) or through Apple Hill Playhouse (724-468-5050) Prepaid vouchers to use as gifts are available through Apple Hill Playhouse.
